name: [TF2] Zombie Apocalypse
short_description:
A Zombie Apocalypse Plugin/Mod for TF2, include custom written include file and sourcepawn code. Will be privately released.

Gameplay

6 Defenders play against 18 Zombies (on a 24 slot server). If a zombie hurts a defender they are turned against their team. All zombies have a custom zombie model.

The defenders have to last for a different amount of time depending on the difficulty.

Defenders can access the defender store by typing !store; they receive $25 on every kill that they can spend in the shop.

Store;

$25 - +10 health

$500 - +50 Max Health

$100 - +10 Ammo

$500 - Regen Health + Ammo

$1000 - Regen $10 every second

$250 - Lower Gravity
